ComicInfo.Summary: Liesel Van Helsing has spent the better part of her life hunting all types of monsters that have threatened the lives of innocents and the people she loved. But when a long-dormant evil returns from within someone she holds dear, Liesel must decide whether her faith in her friends outweighs her duty to the world. Guest starring Julie Jekyll!
ComicInfo.Title: The Horror Beneath
ComicInfo.Writer: Dave Franchini,David Wohl,Patrick Shand,Pat Shand,Pat Shand,Dave Franchini,David Wohl
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Al Barrionuevo,Carla Cohen,Derlis Santacruz,Elias Chatzoudis,Ivan Nunes,Ivan Tao,Julius Abrera,Paul Green,Robby Bevard,Ron Leary Jr.,Sanju Nivangune
